page.t: WarehouseFleet ships will only buy from NPC stations if the player account will remain above this threshold.
Enable/Disable auto-transfer of credits from Warehouse accounts to Player account. Amount is defined below.
If 'Transfer to Player' is enabled, auto-transfers will occur when Warehouse account exceeds this amount. Auto-transfers all but the minimum amount.
Enable/Disable auto-transfer of credits from Player account to Warehouse accounts. Amount is defined below.
If 'Transfer to Station' is enabled, auto-transfers will occur when Warehouse account drops below this amount. Auto-transfers up to the minimum amount.
